sources.title: The Mysterious Island (MGM,1929) JULES VERNEüçï LIONEL BARRYMOREüçï SCI-FI CLASSIC
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Writer: Jules Verne (based on a Novel by)
Stars: Lionel Barrymore, Jacqueline Gadsden, Lloyd Hughes
Directors: Lucien Hubbard, Benjamin Christensen (uncredited)
üçï Presented with its Original Syncronized Scoreüçï
Take a deep dive into the thrilling evolution of Sci-Fi cinema, with visionary filmmaker Lucien Hubbard and the father of Science Fiction, Jules Verne! Inspired by the fabled backstory of Captain Nemo, this groundbreaking adaptation stars Lionel Barrymore as the daring inventor and fearless undersea explorer. 

Part silent, part talkie ‚Äî it captures Hollywood in transition, with one foot in the past‚Ä¶ and the other boldly stepping into the unknown.
